> Compute $C(6, 2)$ and check your answer by enumeration.

$$\binom{6}{2} = \frac{6 \cdot 5}{2!} = 15$$

The combinations are:

1. $\{1,2\}$
1. $\{1,3\}$
1. $\{1,4\}$
1. $\{1,5\}$
1. $\{1,6\}$
1. $\{2,3\}$
1. $\{2,4\}$
1. $\{2,5\}$
1. $\{2,6\}$
1. $\{3,4\}$
1. $\{3,5\}$
1. $\{3,6\}$
1. $\{4,5\}$
1. $\{4,6\}$
1. $\{5,6\}$
